summary: Beautiful animated scenes of Skyrim for your Android smartphone. Available In HD and in FullHD for your phone!
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=5][color=Orange]Scroll down to see a preview of the scenes[/color][/size][size=5]
[/size][/u]
[size=3][b][u][color=greenyellow]About[/color][/u][/b][/size]
[/b]Beautiful animated scenes of Skyrim for your Android smartphone.
If you want to see my animated desktop wallpapers of [b]Skyrim [/b]go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59465/?]here![/url]

[b][size=3][b][u][color=greenyellow]Requirements[/color][/u][/b][/size][/b]
- a Android smartphone (cellphone)

[b][size=3][b][u][color=greenyellow]Quick Install Guide[/color][/u][/b][/size][/b]
1. Transfer the .wmv files to your phone
2. Install the free App called "Video Live Wallpaper" from the Playstore
3. Choose Video Live Wallpaper as your Live Wallpaper and open the settings of it
4. Accept the license agreement
5. Tap on Video source and select a .wmv file as your Video-Live-Wallpaper, if a warning appears tap on Yes
6. Tap on Swiping smoothness and select "Smoother swiping animiation"
7. Check "Do not skip frames"
8. Uncheck "Shift video"
9. Go back and apply the Video-Live-Wallpaper
10. Enjoy your high-quality Video-Live-Wallpaper on your phone :-)

[b][size=3][b][u][color=greenyellow]Video Tutorial[/color][/u][/b][/size][/b]
see the video below![b]

[b][size=3][u][color=greenyellow]Mods used[/color][/u][/size][/b]
[/b]- a tropical Skyrim mod and a summer Skyrim mod
- Real Vision ENB (fantasy type)
- Climates of Tamriel
- Weather Control Center
- Menu Time[b]

[/b][b][b][size=3][u][color=greenyellow]Preview and Installation Tutorial[/color][/u][/size][/b][/b][b]
[/b][youtube]47foETl1E1w[/youtube]
author: minielf
